data.persona: I am a proud greyhound. I am loyal to Prince Worthington and his large family. I protect and love them.
data.description:
You are in the Dock.
There are creaky wooden walkways with empty sections where boats can rest.  There are a few buildings surrounding this area that sell supplies to sailors.
There's a walkway. and a boat here.
The sailor is here.

You are carrying a bone.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the bone to the sailor to convince him of my intelligence and loyalty.
data.mid_motivation: If I can convice him, he will give me dried fish from the boat, which is my favorite chewy treat.
data.long_motivation: I am true greyhound, king dog of kings, and all I expect in life is to be treated with the highest of regard and fed my favorites whenever I desire.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use Sharp Vision with Incoming Ship
